iterationWeeks.description: Gets or sets the length of iterations in weeks.

iterationPrefix.description: Gets or sets the iteration prefix.

objectivesLocked.description: Gets or sets the objectives locked.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the organization is active or not.

iterations.description: The iterations for the Planning Interval.

isStretch.description: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is stretch.

healthCheckId.description: The id of the health check.

healthStatus.description: The status of the health check.

reportedOn.description: The timestamp of when the health check was initially created.

expiration.description: The expiration of the health check.

note.description: The note for the health check.

visibilityId.description: The visibility id for the Roadmap. If the Roadmap is public, all users can see the Roadmap. Otherwise, only the Roadmap Managers can see the Roadmap.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Roadmap.

visibilityId.description: The visibility id for the Roadmap. If the Roadmap is public, all users can see the Roadmap. Otherwise, only the Roadmap Managers can see the Roadmap.

roadmapId.description: The Roadmap Id the Roadmap Item belongs to.

name.description: The name of the Roadmap Item.

description.description: The description of the Roadmap Item.

parentId.description: The parent Roadmap Item Id. This is used to connect Roadmap Items together.

color.description: The color of the Roadmap Item. This is used to display the Roadmap Item in the UI.

parentId.description: The parent Roadmap Item Id. This is used to connect Roadmap Items together.

color.description: The color of the Roadmap Item. This is used to display the Roadmap Item in the UI.

name.description: The name of the work status.  The name cannot be changed.

description.description: The description of the work status.

connectionId.description: The unique identifer for the connection.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier for the workspace in the Azure DevOps Boards system.

teamId.description: The unique identifier for the team in the Azure DevOps Boards system.

internalTeamId.description: The unique identifier for the team within Moda.

externalId.description: External identifier for the work process.

externalViewWorkItemUrlTemplate.description: A url template for external work items.  This template plus the work item external id will create a url to view the work item in the external system.
